meanings.definition: Not blinking or averting one's eyes
meanings.sent1: The unblinking owl stared at its prey in the dark forest.
meanings.sent2: She kept an unblinking gaze on the horizon, waiting for the sunrise.
meanings.sent3: The unblinking cat watched the laser pointer move around the room with intense focus.
meanings.sent4: His unblinking determination to finish the race earned him the first-place trophy.
meanings.sent5: The unblinking stare of the portrait on the wall gave the room an eerie feeling.

meanings.sent1: She answered the question unblinking, showing her confidence in the subject.
meanings.sent2: He jumped into the water unblinking, ready to swim across the lake.
meanings.sent3: The chef added the secret ingredient unblinking, knowing it would enhance the flavor.
meanings.sent4: The actor delivered his lines unblinking, impressing the audience with his skill.
meanings.sent5: The student raised her hand unblinking, eager to participate in the discussion.
